page.title: 18CHILDRENS' GAMES-WIRKSWORTH
page.content: {INDOORS }COMPUTER GAMES, DOLLS FOR HOME AND SCHOOL PLAY, SOLDIERS FOR WAR GAMES. GAMES USING SET RULES, DICE, CARDS OR SYMBOLS LIKE MONOPOLY, SNAP AND DOMINOES. DRESSING UP GAMES TOO. {PARTIES} GROUP GAMES LIKE BLIND MANS BUFF AND DISCOS. {OUTDOORS }BALLS, SKIPPING ROPES, HOOLA HOOPS, HOPSCOTCH AND BIKES. CHASING GAMES ARE PLAYED WITH FRIENDS AS WELL AS IMAGINARY-LET'S PRETEND GAMES. {TEAM GAMES} MAINLY WITH BALL AND SET RULES, FOOTBALL, CRICKET, ROUNDERS AND HOCKEY. THE ABOVE IS THE RESULT OF A SURVEY CARRIED WITH CHILDREN IN WIRKSWORTH AGED 5 TO 8.
